descripcion:
• Company Description:

    We are an international company that values discipline, consistency, and transparency. We implement tech solutions using high-quality design standards, frameworks, and trusted methodologies.

    Job requirements:

    Bachelor in Computer Science (or related)

    Previous experience as a Salesforce Developer (minimum 2 years)

    Strong Communications skills

    Ability to solve problem sets

    Preferred Familiarity with Multi-tenant, cloud environments

    Ability to multitask

    Team player

    Loves to be constantly challenged and fits within our company culture

    Salesforce certifications preferred.

    Specific duties of the role

    - Deliver on technical aspects of Salesforce software implementation and customization projects, including development, configuration, testing and deployment

    - Implement and configure Salesforce to address business needs and processes

    - Participate in integrations & complex projects by assisting, mentoring and learning from senior resources as needed

    - Execute data migration and provide post go-live stabilization support

    - Communicate senior resources, project management regarding your tasks status and issue resolution throughout projects, as well as to provide and log time management per project in our time tracking tools.

    - Create documentation for ongoing client reference

    - Maintain all your certifications up to date

    - Earn, at least, one (2) recommended certification per year. We'll support you in achieving this goal!
• Conocimientos: C#, CSS, Dot Net, HTML, Java
